# forgejo_team_membership (Resource)

Forgejo team membership resource.
Note: Managing teams requires administrative privileges!



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `team_id` (Number) Numeric identifier of the team.
- `user_id` (Number) Numeric identifier of the user.

### Read-Only

- `user_name` (String) Name of the user.
